Houston.James L. Autry House (Courtlandt Place,: James L. Autry House is located at 5 Courtlandt Place in Houston, Texas, and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Design is credited to Alfred C. Finn, when he worked for the Fort Worth architecture firm of Sanguinet & Staats, and was executed in 1912. Autry was a general counsel and director for Texaco.
